pullrequest.title: Use default material properties from ign-common PBR material when loading a mesh

content.raw: Following discussions in the [ign-common PR](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/pull-requests/231) that is connected to this, it seems the discussion led to the conclusion that the behavior should be merged to Citadel, in such case should this PR be closed and retargeted to ign-rendering3?
content.html: Following discussions in the ign-common PR that is connected to this, it seems the discussion led to the conclusion that the behavior should be merged to Citadel, in such case should this PR be closed and retargeted to ign-rendering3?
